nodes.text: Typhoon Squadron was a squadron of T-65B X-wing starfighters that flew for the New Republic's Starfighter Corps. The pilots of the squadron were specialists that were not afraid of uncomfortable encounters with the Galactic Empire. The unit's starfighters were painted in yellow and green colors.
The colors of Typhoon Squadron were added as a customizable cosmetic appearance for players in update 3.0 to the video game Star Wars: Squadrons on November 25, 2020.
